edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The character drawn in-game that interacts with game elements, which the user can control.
    Author:
    bowenzhi

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int x,
      int y,
      int border,
      int fWidth,
      Character c,
      Character c2,
      boolean sfx)
        Instantiates this Player with the given initial conditions.
        Parameters:
        x - X-position
        y - Y-position
        border - Border width of the game frame
        fWidth - Width of the game frame
        c - Primary character
        c2 - Secondary character
        sfx - Whether or not to play sound effects

        fWidth - Width of the game frame
        c - Primary character

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
        Renders the player
        Parameters:
        gl - GL object necessary to carry out rendering

      • step

        public void step(InputHandler input)
        Steps through the player's movements, applying keyboard controls. This is called every frame.
        Parameters:
        input - InputHandler object corresponding to the input from the user during this game session

      • stepWithBullets

        public void stepWithBullets(InputHandler input,
                   HashArray<com.sun.opengl.util.texture.Texture,PlayerLaunchedBullet> bullets,
                   BarrierBullet[] barrier)
        Steps through the player's movements, applying keyboard controls, and then through the player's shot bullets and/or bombs.
        Parameters:
        input - InputHandler object corresponding to the input from the user during this game session
        bullets - Reference for the game's master HashArray of bullets present in the game
        barrier - Reference to a BarrierBullet, in the case that the player's defensive bomb utilizes it

      • getArea

        public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getArea()
        Returns:
        The hitbox of the character

      • getGrazeArea

        public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getGrazeArea()
        Returns:
        The graze hitbox of the character

      • death

        public void death()
        Called when the player dies. Starts invincibility and explosion timers

      • getX

        public java.lang.Integer getX()
        Returns:
        Reference to the player's x position (useful for tracking the player's movements)

      • getY

        public java.lang.Integer getY()
        Returns:
        Reference to the player's y position (useful for tracking the player's movements)

      • getR

        public int getR()

      • getLives

        public int getLives()

      • getFocus

        public boolean getFocus()

      • getTimestopEffect

        public float getTimestopEffect()
        Returns:
        A float from 0.0f to 1.0f representing how much time should flow the next frame (1.0f = full speed, 0.0f = zero speed)

      • respawn

        public void respawn()
        Respawns the character at the default respawn point. Occurs after death.
